channel.title: Shot Gun Fun Fun "Zombie Fall Online"
channel.description:
Well GML is a douche, but at least from this the community learned of a cool game that he leached. The real one has much smoother game play but yeah enjoy.
http://sandbox.yoyogames.com/games/156833-shotgun-funfun-online

item.title: Shot Gun Fun Fun "Zombie Fall Online"
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Ok, and how should maps be made?
We could use davids map editor, but change it so it works in a format that we can use.
Also, custom maps with a in-game map downloader from the serer?
I would like that.
Its great to get ideas out there before we start, so we know exactly what to do when the time comes

Read full topic

But first we will need to decide what languages we will use, and who will lead the project.

Ill throw myself into content and artwork.[/quote]I’m pretty decent at pixel art and mapping and i could write some content once we get the framework set up

ANd yeah, i mean, we could do so many things with this game style.

But yeah, if we make everything and have a good server setup/lobby system, we could have a really popular game.

item.title: Shot Gun Fun Fun "Zombie Fall Online"
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:25, topic:408597”]Why not actually get a group together and make a game like this, but online, and in a better language?
I would help with level design and art work.

Im serious about this, and If it works out well, why not make a few other simple 2D games? i mean, we have the rescourses and the skills, just not the motivation to do this.

Should we start a dev team topic in the general programming section?[/quote]

shrogg clean out your inbox :mad:

item.title: Shot Gun Fun Fun "Zombie Fall Online"

item.description:

Im serious about this, and If it works out well, why not make a few other simple 2D games? i mean, we have the rescourses and the skills, just not the motivation to do this.

Should we start a dev team topic in the general programming section?
